Summer Movies NYC

May

  1. Lion – 2016 (PG-13)

    A five-year-old Indian boy gets lost on the streets of Calcutta, thousands of kilometers from home. He survives many challenges before being adopted by a couple in Australia. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

    • Date: Tue May 23
    • Venue: Yotel

  2. Top Gun – 1986 (PG)

    As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

    • Date: Tue May 23
    • Venue: Yotel

  3. Erin Brockovich – 2000 (R)

    An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

    • Date: Wed May 24
    • Venue: OfficeOps

  4. Split – 2016 (PG-13)

    Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

    • Date: Wed May 24
    • Venue: Yotel

  5. 20th Century Women – 2016 (R)

    The story of a teenage boy, his mother, and two other women who help raise him among the love and freedom of Southern California of 1979.

    • Date: Thu May 25
    • Venue: Yotel

  6. Pretty Woman – 1990 (R)
